Who is the beneficial owner of the cosmetic business?

Scenario

Nicole Smith comes into ABC Bank and wants to open an account in the name of her cosmetics business. She is a new customer, and she reveals that she owns 50% of her cosmetics business and her husband William Smith owns the other 50%. She intends for the account to be used for deposits from third parties making payments for her cosmetics. ABC Bank creates the account. The next day $30,000 is deposited into Nicole's account by an anonymous source.

Nicole and William Smith

Nicole Smith

William Smith

 
 
 

That is correct!

 

The beneficial owner is the individual who owns 25% or more of the customer. Nicole and William both own more than 25% of the cosmetics business. Therefore they are both beneficial owners.

That is incorrect

 

The beneficial owner is the individual who owns 25% or more of the customer. Nicole and William both own more than 25% of the cosmetics business. Therefore they are both beneficial owners.

That is incorrect

 

The beneficial owner is the individual who owns 25% or more of the customer. Nicole and William both own more than 25% of the cosmetics business. Therefore they are both beneficial owners.
